title: Medical Definition of Vaccination, children's
author: Medical Editor Melissa Conrad Stöppler; MD
description: Read medical definition of Vaccination, children's
cleaned_text: Vaccination, children's: Vaccinations given to children. [In](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=3950) the US, it is currently recommended that all children receive [vaccination](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=5925) against the following unless the child has special circumstances, such as a compromised [immune system](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=3907)
